name: Platform View
eventQuery: events(type=alert and name="POD CPU Usage Deviance")

sources.name: a
sources.query: default(0, align(1m, count(lowpass(1, ts("kubernetes.node.status.condition", cluster="${cluster}" and condition="Ready")))))

sources.name: SEVERE
sources.query: align(1m, taggify(ts(~alert.isfiring.* and (alertTag1="K8s") and severity=SEVERE) + 4, metric, alertId, 2, "."))

sources.name: WARN
sources.query: align(1m, taggify(ts(~alert.isfiring.* and (alertTag1="K8s") and severity=WARN) + 3, metric, alertId, 2, "."))

sources.name: SMOKE
sources.query: align(1m, taggify(ts(~alert.isfiring.* and (alertTag1="K8s") and severity=SMOKE) + 2, metric, alertId, 2, "."))

sources.name: INFO
sources.query: align(1m, taggify(ts(~alert.isfiring.* and (alertTag1="K8s") and severity=INFO), metric, alertId, 2, "."))

sources.name: A
sources.query: count(align(60s, mean, mcount(5m, ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.usage" and cluster="${cluster}"))))

charts.name: Active Containers
charts.description: Revenue of total delivered T-shirts in this current view window

sources.name: api_server_sli
sources.query: (cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.apiserver.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}" AND verb="${verb}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)) > 1

sources.name: api_server_sli
sources.query: cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.apiserver.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}" AND verb="${verb}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)

sources.name: etcd_sli
sources.query: (cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.etcd.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}" AND operation="${etcd-operation}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)) > 1

sources.name: etcd_sli
sources.query: cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.etcd.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}" AND operation="${etcd-operation}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)

sources.name: coredns_sli
sources.query: (cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.coredns.dns.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)) > 1

sources.name: coredns_sli
sources.query: cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.coredns.dns.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)

sources.name: api_server_sli
sources.query: cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.apiserver.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}" AND verb="${verb}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)

sources.name: etcd_sli
sources.query: cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.etcd.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="*" AND operation="${etcd-operation}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)

sources.name: coredns_sli
sources.query: cumulativePercentile(99.0,rawsum(align(60s, mean, aliasMetric(mavg(5m, rate(ts("kubernetes.controlplane.coredns.dns.request.duration.seconds.bucket", cluster="${cluster}"))), '')) by (le)), metrics, sources, pointTags)

charts.description: Average CPU node utilization for control plane nodes.
Average memory utilization for control plane nodes.

sources.name: memory_util
sources.query: limit(250, ts("kubernetes.node.memory.working_set", cluster="*" and node_role="control-plane") / ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_allocatable", cluster="*" and node_role="control-plane") * 100)

charts.description: Average storage utilization for control plane nodes.

sources.name: storage
sources.query: ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.usage", cluster="*" and node_role="*") / ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.limit", cluster="${cluster}" and node_role="control-plane")

sources.name: Pod CPU Usage
sources.query: ts(kubernetes.pod.cpu.usage_rate, cluster="${cluster}" and namespace_name=${namespace} and pod_name=${pod})

sources.name: Container Mem Usage
sources.query: ts(kubernetes.pod_container.memory.usage, cluster="${cluster}" and namespace_name=${namespace} and container_name=${container})

sources.name: Pod Mem Usage
sources.query: ts(kubernetes.pod.memory.usage, cluster="${cluster}" and namespace_name=${namespace} and pod_name=${pod})

sources.name: Used
sources.query: ts(kubernetes.pod.filesystem.usage, cluster="${cluster}"and nodename=${node} and namespace_name=${namespace} and pod_name=${pod})

sources.name: Available
sources.query: ts(kubernetes.pod.filesystem.available, cluster="${cluster}" and nodename=${node} and namespace_name=${namespace} and pod_name=${pod})

sources.name: Source
sources.query: limit(250, ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.usage", cluster="${cluster}" and nodename="${node}") / ts("kubernetes.node.filesystem.limit", cluster="${cluster}" and nodename="${node}") * 100)

container.queryValue: ts(kubernetes.pod_container.uptime , cluster="${cluster}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and pod_name="${pod}")
container.label: Container

pod.queryValue: ts(kubernetes.pod.uptime, cluster="${cluster}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and pod_name!="agentupdater*" and pod_name!="wavefront*" and pod_name!="kube*")
pod.label: Pod
